game.name: Age of Empires Mobile: PC Edition
game.genres: Casual, Simulation, Strategy, Free To Play
game.categories: Multi-player, MMO, PvP, Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements
game.shortDescription: Age of Empires 프랜차이즈의 계보를 잇는 중세 전쟁 전략 게임 - 모바일 전용 제작, PC 최적화 완료
game.shortDescriptionEn: A Medieval War Strategy Game of Age of Empires lineage — built for mobile, optimized for PC. Advance your civilization in a new way with iconic heroes, story quests, and massive multiplayer warfare with PC-friendly UI, precise mouse-and-keyboard play, 4K graphical fidelity, and seamless crossplay.
